subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The referee Stéphane Lannoy, who garnered negative attention for his work in the World Cup, redeemed himself by cracking down in a Champions League qualifying match.
snippet: The referee Stéphane Lannoy, who garnered negative attention for his work in the World Cup, redeemed himself by cracking down in a Champions League qualifying match.
